Home.heroTitle: Automate Your Real Estate Photo Editing
Home.heroSubtitle: AI-powered HDR, Sky Replacement, and Window Pulls in seconds.
Home.heroDescription: Stop wasting hours on manual editing. Get consistent, professional-grade results instantly and save up to 90% of your editing costs.
Home.featuresTitle: Picture Success With AI Image Editing
Home.featuresSubtitle: Aurix edits your real estate images to the finest detail. Fully optimized for the real estate industry.

hdr.title: HDR Merging
hdr.description: Instantly group and merge multiple exposures into a single high dynamic range image. The result is a balanced, natural look that captures the full depth of your image.

window.title: Window Pulling
window.description: Aurix detects windows and applies a precise mask to reveal a clear view of the outside. This ensures interiors and exteriors are both visible with perfect clarity.

sky.title: Sky Replacement
sky.description: Automatically transform overcast skies into bright skies for a more inviting look. Instantly boost the appeal and clarity of every image with natural-looking skies.

whiteBalance.title: White Balance
whiteBalance.description: White balance is adjusted automatically to perfectly reflect natural colors, by identifying what should be white in each image. This results in images with consistent, accurate color tones.

perspective.title: Perspective Correction
perspective.description: Perfectly straighten your images for a balanced, representative view. Both internals and externals will appear naturally aligned and professionally edited.

relighting.title: Image Relighting
relighting.description: Image relighting adjusts brightness, highlights, and shadows to create a well-lit, dynamic image. The result is a more visually engaging image with well-balanced exposure.

raw.title: RAW Support
raw.description: Upload RAW files directly for maximum quality preservation. Get the most detail and dynamic range from your professional camera shots.

privacy.title: Auto Privacy
privacy.description: Automatically detect and blur license plates, faces, and other sensitive information. Ensure compliance and protect privacy in every listing photo.

colorCorrection.title: Color Correction
colorCorrection.description: Enhance vibrancy and ensure accurate color reproduction across all images. Create stunning, true-to-life photos that attract more buyers.

Home.comparisonTitle: Faster and Cheaper than Manual Editing
Home.comparisonSubtitle: Get high quality enhancements at a fraction of the time and cost compared to manual editing.
Home.pricingSubtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

PreFooter.title: Ready to get started?
PreFooter.subtitle: Join thousands of real estate professionals saving time with AI.

Footer.description: The AI photo editor that enhances your workflow.

sky-replacement.title: AI Sky Replacement
sky-replacement.description: Instantly replace dull, overcast skies with beautiful blue skies. Our AI automatically detects the sky and replaces it with a perfect match, adjusting lighting and reflections for a natural look.

benefit1.title: Perfect Weather
benefit1.desc: Guarantee blue skies in every listing, regardless of when you shot.

benefit2.title: Automated Masking
benefit2.desc: No need for manual selection. Our AI handles complex horizons like trees and wires.

benefit3.title: Realistic Lighting
benefit3.desc: The entire image is relit to match the new sky for a photorealistic result.

perspective-correction.title: Perspective Correction
perspective-correction.description: Fix converging verticals and distorted angles automatically. Ensure your architectural lines are straight and true, just like professional tilt-shift photography.

benefit1.title: Vertical Alignment
benefit1.desc: Automatically straighten vertical lines for a professional, balanced composition.

benefit2.title: Lens Distortion Fix
benefit2.desc: Correct barrel and pincushion distortion from wide-angle lenses.

benefit3.title: Auto-Crop
benefit3.desc: Intelligent cropping ensures you keep the most important parts of the image.

hdr-merge.title: HDR Merging
hdr-merge.description: Merge multiple exposures into a single, perfectly balanced image. Capture details in both the brightest highlights and darkest shadows without the fake 'HDR look'.

benefit1.title: Full Dynamic Range
benefit1.desc: See clearly out of windows while keeping interior details bright.

benefit2.title: Natural Tone Check
benefit2.desc: Our algorithms ensure colors remain natural and vibrant.

benefit3.title: Ghost Reduction
benefit3.desc: Automatically removes motion artifacts from moving objects between frames.

window-pulling.title: Crystal Clear Window Pulling
window-pulling.description: Make views through windows clear and vibrant. Stop choosing between an exposed room or an exposed view—get both perfectly.

benefit1.title: View Clarity
benefit1.desc: Reveal the garden, city, or ocean view that sells the property.

benefit2.title: Glare Reduction
benefit2.desc: Minimize reflections and haze on glass surfaces.

benefit3.title: Seamless Blending
benefit3.desc: The exterior view blends naturally with the interior lighting.

white-balance.title: Auto White Balance
white-balance.description: Remove color casts effectively. Turn orange tungsten light or blue shade coldness into clean, neutral white light that potential buyers love.

benefit1.title: Neutral Whites
benefit1.desc: Walls and ceilings look crisp and white, not yellow or blue.

benefit2.title: Mixed Lighting Fix
benefit2.desc: Handles complex scenes with mixed daylight and artificial light sources.

benefit3.title: Vibrant Accents
benefit3.desc: Keeps furniture and decor colors accurate and punchy.

image-relighting.title: AI Image Relighting
image-relighting.description: Brighten dark rooms and add depth to flat images. Simulates professional lighting setups to make every room feel inviting and spacious.

benefit1.title: Shadow Lifting
benefit1.desc: Gently brighten dark corners without introducing noise.

benefit2.title: Depth Enhancement
benefit2.desc: Adds subtle contrast to emphasize room structure and layout.

benefit3.title: Even Illumination
benefit3.desc: Balances light distribution across the room for significant appeal.

raw-support.title: RAW Format Support
raw-support.description: Edit directly from your camera's RAW files for maximum quality. We support CR2, NEF, ARW, DNG and more.

benefit1.title: Non-Destructive
benefit1.desc: Preserve all original image data during the editing process.

benefit2.title: Higher Bit Depth
benefit2.desc: Work with more color information for smoother gradients.

benefit3.title: Universal Support
benefit3.desc: Compatible with RAW files from all major camera manufacturers.

auto-privacy.title: Automated Privacy Blurring
auto-privacy.description: Automatically detect and blur faces and license plates to comply with privacy regulations like GDPR without manual work.

benefit1.title: Face Detection
benefit1.desc: Identifies and blurs faces in public or street view shots.

benefit2.title: License Plates
benefit2.desc: Automatically blurs car number plates in driveway and street photos.

benefit3.title: GDPR Safe
benefit3.desc: Ensures your marketing materials meet privacy standards.

color-correction.title: Color Correction
color-correction.description: Enhance vibrancy and ensure accurate color reproduction across all images. Create stunning, true-to-life photos that attract more buyers.

benefit1.title: Vibrancy Boost
benefit1.desc: Make dull images pop with intelligent saturation adjustments.

benefit2.title: True Colors
benefit2.desc: Ensure wood tones, grass, and sky look exactly as they should.

benefit3.title: Consistency
benefit3.desc: Maintain a cohesive look across your entire portfolio.
